class.name: NavigationMeshSourceGeometryData3D
class.brief_description: Container for parsed source geometry data used in navigation mesh baking.
class.description: Container for parsed source geometry data used in navigation mesh baking.

method.name: add_faces
method.description: Adds an array of vertex positions to the geometry data for navigation mesh baking to form triangulated faces. For each face the array must have three vertex positions in clockwise winding order. Since [NavigationMesh] resources have no transform, all vertex positions need to be offset by the node's transform using [param xform].

method.name: add_mesh
method.description: Adds the geometry data of a [Mesh] resource to the navigation mesh baking data. The mesh must have valid triangulated mesh data to be considered. Since [NavigationMesh] resources have no transform, all vertex positions need to be offset by the node's transform using [param xform].

method.name: add_mesh_array
method.description: Adds an [Array] the size of [constant Mesh.ARRAY_MAX] and with vertices at index [constant Mesh.ARRAY_VERTEX] and indices at index [constant Mesh.ARRAY_INDEX] to the navigation mesh baking data. The array must have valid triangulated mesh data to be considered. Since [NavigationMesh] resources have no transform, all vertex positions need to be offset by the node's transform using [param xform].

method.name: add_projected_area_box
method.description: Adds a new projected area of shape type box to the source geometry. The areas axis-aligned bounding box is defined by an [param aabb].

method.name: add_projected_area_cylinder
method.description: Adds a new projected area of shape type cylinder to the source geometry. The cylinder is created at [param position] with [param radius] and extruded by [param height] along the y-axis.

method.name: add_projected_area_polygon
method.description: Adds a new projected area of shape type polygon to the source geometry. The [param vertices] are considered projected on a xz-axes plane, placed at the global y-axis [param elevation] and extruded by [param height].

method.name: add_projected_obstruction
method.description: Adds a projected obstruction shape to the source geometry. The [param vertices] are considered projected on a xz-axes plane, placed at the global y-axis [param elevation] and extruded by [param height]. If [param carve] is [code]true[/code] the carved shape will not be affected by additional offsets (e.g. agent radius) of the navigation mesh baking process.

method.name: append_arrays
method.description: Appends arrays of [param vertices] and [param indices] at the end of the existing arrays. Adds the existing index as an offset to the appended indices.

method.name: clear
method.description: Clears the internal data.

method.name: clear_projected_areas
method.description: Clears all projected areas.

method.name: clear_projected_obstructions
method.description: Clears all projected obstructions.

method.name: get_bounds
method.description: Returns an axis-aligned bounding box that covers all the stored geometry data. The bounds are calculated when calling this function with the result cached until further geometry changes are made.

method.name: get_indices
method.description: Returns the parsed source geometry data indices array.

method.name: get_projected_areas
method.description: Returns the projected areas as an [Array] of dictionaries. Each [Dictionary] contains the following entries: - [code]vertices[/code] - A [PackedVector3Array] that defines the outline points of the projected shape. Used by areas of type [enum NavigationServer3D.AreaShapeType3D] [constant NavigationServer3D.AREA_SHAPE_POLYGON]. - [code]aabb[/code] - A global [AABB] of the projected shape. Used by all area types. - [code]position[/code] - A [Vector3] that defines the global position of the area shape. Used by all area types. - [code]radius[/code] - A [float] that defines the radius of the projected shape. Used by areas of type [enum NavigationServer3D.AreaShapeType3D] [constant NavigationServer3D.AREA_SHAPE_CYLINDER]. - [code]elevation[/code] - A [float] that defines the projected shape placement on the y-axis. Used by areas of type [enum NavigationServer3D.AreaShapeType3D] [constant NavigationServer3D.AREA_SHAPE_POLYGON]. - [code]height[/code] - A [float] that defines how much the projected shape is extruded along the y-axis. Used by all area types. - [code]navigation_layers[/code] - An [int] that defines the navigation layers bits that this area affects. Used by all area types. - [code]priority[/code] - An [int] that defines the sorting order in case of overlap with higher values taking priority. Used by all area types. - [code]shape_type[/code] - An [int] that defines the used shape. Maps to [enum NavigationServer3D.AreaShapeType3D].

method.name: get_projected_obstructions
method.description: Returns the projected obstructions as an [Array] of dictionaries. Each [Dictionary] contains the following entries: - [code]vertices[/code] - A [PackedFloat32Array] that defines the outline points of the projected shape. - [code]elevation[/code] - A [float] that defines the projected shape placement on the y-axis. - [code]height[/code] - A [float] that defines how much the projected shape is extruded along the y-axis. - [code]carve[/code] - A [bool] that defines how the obstacle affects the navigation mesh baking. If [code]true[/code] the projected shape will not be affected by addition offsets, e.g. agent radius.

method.name: get_vertices
method.description: Returns the parsed source geometry data vertices array.

method.name: has_data
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] when parsed source geometry data exists.

method.name: merge
method.description: Adds the geometry data of another [NavigationMeshSourceGeometryData3D] to the navigation mesh baking data.

method.name: set_indices
method.description: Sets the parsed source geometry data indices. The indices need to be matched with appropriated vertices. [b]Warning:[/b] Inappropriate data can crash the baking process of the involved third-party libraries.

method.name: set_projected_areas
method.description: Sets the projected areas with an Array of Dictionaries with the following key value pairs: [codeblocks] [gdscript] "vertices" : PackedFloat32Array "aabb" : AABB "position" : Vector3 "radius" : float "elevation" : float "height" : float "navigation_layers" : int "priority" : int "shape_type" : int [/gdscript] [/codeblocks]

method.name: set_projected_obstructions
method.description: Sets the projected obstructions with an Array of Dictionaries with the following key value pairs: [codeblocks] [gdscript] "vertices" : PackedFloat32Array "elevation" : float "height" : float "carve" : bool [/gdscript] [/codeblocks]

method.name: set_vertices
method.description: Sets the parsed source geometry data vertices. The vertices need to be matched with appropriated indices. [b]Warning:[/b] Inappropriate data can crash the baking process of the involved third-party libraries.
